name: lambda-serverless
description: AWS Serverless Lambda setup with CDK

scripts.test:build: cd infrastructure && npm run build && npm run synth
scripts.setup: docker compose up -d && echo 'Starting LocalStack...' && sleep 20 && (node scripts/run-with-localstack.js setup-hosts || true) && echo 'Bootstrap LocalStack...' && cd infrastructure && node ../scripts/run-with-localstack.js bootstrap
scripts.dev: (cd infrastructure && node ../scripts/run-with-localstack.js deploy --all --require-approval never 2>&1) | tee .localstack-deploy.log && node scripts/echo-localstack-urls.js .localstack-deploy.log && docker compose logs -f localstack
scripts.destroy: cd infrastructure && node ../scripts/run-with-localstack.js destroy --all --force && docker compose down
